snippet: The departing general secretary of the party, Hu Jintao, prepared to hand power on Thursday to Xi Jinping, son of a revered revolutionary leader who was also an architect of China’s economic transformation.
abstract: Chinese Communist Party unveils new leadership slate headed by Xi Jinping, son of  revered revolutionary leader who was also architect of China's economic transformation; Xi faces task of guiding China to more sustainable model of growth and managing country's rise as global power (Series: Changing of the Guard).
lead_paragraph: The departing general secretary of the party, Hu Jintao, prepared to hand power on Thursday to Xi Jinping, son of a revered revolutionary leader who was also an architect of China’s economic transformation.

headline.seo: Ending Congress, China Presents New Leadership Headed by Xi Jinping

headline.print_headline: Ending Congress, China Presents New Leadership Headed by Xi Jinping
